SELECT DISTINCT U.USER_IDX , USER_NAME , USER_COMP , USER_DEPT , USER_SEX , USER_REGISTER_DATE , C.CAREERDATE FROM USER_INFO U LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_INFO_SKILL S ON U.USER_IDX = S.USER_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT USER_IDX, NVL(SUM((SKILL_ENDDATE-SKILL_STARTDATE)/365), 0) CAREERDATE FROM USER_INFO_SKILL GROUP BY USER_IDX) C ON C.USER_IDX = S.USER_IDX
ORDER BY USER_REGISTER_DATE DESC

SELECT USER_IDX , USER_NAME , USER_SOCIAL_SECUNUM , USER_SEX , USER_COMP , TO_CHAR(USER_COMP_ENTERDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USER_COMP_ENTERDATE , USER_DEPT , USER_SPOT , USER_ARMY_SERV_PERIOD , USER_MARITAL_STATUS , USER_ARMY_SERV_ENTER , USER_ARMY_SERV_LEAVE , USER_ARMY_SERV , USER_TELNUM_WIRED , USER_TELNUM_WIRELESS , USER_EMAIL , USER_ZIPCODE , USER_ADDRESS FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
